input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BCAN

String Value - The task id number
Example: TAS000000000157

XML document containing configuration item information to be related to a given task.
Example:
<Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name></name> <instance-id></instance-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name></name> <instance-id></instance-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

String Value - The change id number
Example: CRQ000000000157

String Value - The source of the workflow calling Create Task Relationships"
Example:
Close Task
Create Task
Update Task
SNMP TRAP

output.description:
XML output with task detail
Example: <Tasks> <Task> <job-id /> <task-id>TAS000000000135</task-id> <status>Staged</status> <change-id>CRQ000000000151</change-id> <comments>Install Software</comments> <url /> <logs>***** This is a sample notes entry *****</logs> </Task> </Tasks>

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure

String Value - Verbose success status message
Example: The retrieval of Task data has completed successfully for TAS000000000135

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Bulk Configuration Items were successfully associated with Task ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> <xsl:text>=====================================================</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Source: ${source}</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Configuration Items Without Reconciliation ID:</xsl:text> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:apply-templates select="//name" /> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="name"> <xsl:value-of select="." /> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Bulk Configuration Items were successfully associated and information successfully written to the WorkInfo Log for Task ID: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <tasks> <task> <task-id>${task id}</task-id> <change-id>${change id}</change-id> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </task> </tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Bulk CI Relationship Failed for Task ID: ", .)

output.value: The Configuration Items document was incorrectly formed.

documentation.description: This workflow updates an existing task with CI relationships, or if an unknown CI the task notes field.
